thread.title: Alexander Velkov
thread.title_full: eUKhost Ltd reviewed by Alexander Velkov

author: Alexander Velkov
title: Alexander Velkov
text: Was on with support again after an SSL issue (not their fault). The people (in this case Albert R) are professional and knowledgeable and always solve the issue quickly. Have been with eUKhost for 10 years - assuming the service remains at this level, I'll stay for another 10.
